content: Wonder if there is any extension for gender identity? gender identity

You can read the details on this at the current ballot version of the Patient resource here:
http://hl7.org/fhir/2018Sep/patient.html#gender

Note that the referenced valueset is only an example, as it is very likely to be different in various jurisdictions
http://hl7.org/fhir/2018Sep/extension-patient-genderidentity.html
Excellent thanks. Can you send me an example?
